New York

Located just an hour from New York City on Long Island, LifeSportsUSA/New York is poised to become the preeminent sports facility in the Northeast. This will be the first such sports and health experience in the U.S.
• Brookhaven, NY: Exit 62 on Long Island Expressway
• Full-service amenities and features including special programming, ancillary retail, food and beverage, and entertainment
• Indoor fields:
  • Two full size soccer/lacrosse/football fields
  • Fully climate controlled year-round
• Outdoor fields:
  • Two full size soccer/lacrosse/football fields
